product.name: Nikon 18-105 mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR ED Nikkor Lens
product.description:
Moderately cheap super zoom, often often found in kits.
Note! There are multiple versions of this lens

product.name: Nikon 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 G ED-IF AF-S VR DX
product.description:
Wide to long zoom lens with macro capabilities
* slow * macro capabilities * image stabilization * mechanically good * optically good

product.name: Nikon 18-55 mm f/3.5-5.6 G ED AF-S DX Nikkor Lens
product.description:
Cheap normal zoom, often often found in kits.
Note! There are multiple versions of this lens

product.name: Nikon 18-70mm f/3.5-4.5G ED IF AF-S DX
product.description:
Cheap normal zoom, old, kit lens of Nikon D70.
* Faster than contemporary kit lenses. * Longer range than contemporary kit lenses. * Built in silent wave motor.

product.name: Nikon 28-80mm f/3.3-5.6 AF G
product.description:
Cheap normal zoom lens
* slow * full frame * optically good * fast focus * external focus motor

product.name: Nikon 28-85 mm f/3.5-4.5 AF
product.description:
Old full frame normal zoom
* Full frame

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.8 AF
product.description:
Fast, cheap, very old, long/normal prime lens
* Fast * External focus motor * Full frame * Optically very good
There are several different versions of this lens.

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.8 AF-D
product.description:
Fast, cheap, long/normal prime lens
* Fast * External focus motor * Full frame * Optically very good
There are several different versions of this lens.

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.8 AF-S G
product.description:
Fast, relatively cheap, long/normal prime lens
* Fast * Internal focus motor * Full frame
There are several different versions of this lens.

product.name: Nikon D70 Camera
product.description:
* Electronic shutter, very high flash sync speed. * Low sensitivity, bad for low light. * 6 Mpix
Represents two products: * Nikon D70 * Nikon D70s

product.name: Nikon D90 Camera
product.description: * Mechanical shutter * Moderately good in high ISO

product.name: Nikon SB-24 Flash
product.description: *No optical slave *Few manual steps, to control amount of light.

product.name: Nikon SB-26 Flash
product.description: * Has optical slave capability.

product.name: Sigma 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG HSM (Nikon)
product.description:
Long zoom lens, relatively cheap
* fast * full frame * mechanically very good * heavy * optically good
There are four versions of this lens:
* 2005: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG HSM * 2006: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG Macro HSM * 2007: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG Macro HSM II * 2010: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG OS HSM

product.name: Tamron 17-50mm f/2.8 SP XR Di II LD [IF] (Nikon)
product.description:
High quality, but cheap normal zoom.
* Fast: f/2.8 * Fast focus speed * Need (expensive) camera with focus motor * Optically very good, only cromatic aberation is a slight problem. * Mechanically the lens is only moderately good.
Note: There is a second version of this lens, with vibration reduction, which is optically inferior.

product.name: Tamron 17-50mm f/2.8 SP XR Di II LD [IF] VC (Nikon)
product.description:
High quality, but cheap, standard zoom.
* Fast: f/2.8 * Fast focus speed, even though internal motor is used. * Vibration reduction, which works very well. (4 stops claimed by manufacturer) * Optical performance is good, with sharp centers, but blurry corners at the wide end.
Note: There is a second version of this lens, *without* vibration reduction, which is optically better.

product.name: Tamron 18-200mm f/3.5-6.3 XR Di II LD [IF] (Nikon)
product.description:
Very cheap wide to long zoom lens.
* Slow * Slow focus * External focus motor * Optically decent, but strong distortions

product.name: Tamron 28-200mm f/3.8-5.6 XR IF (Nikon)
product.description:
Very cheap and compact normal to long zoom lens.
* good quality, optically and mechanically * Very small for its focal length * Slow

product.name: Tamron 70-300mm f/4.0-5.6 AF Di LD Macro (Nikon)
product.description:
Cheap long zoom lens with macro capabilities
* Full frame * External focus motor * Mechanically good, but extends much when zooming * Front lens rotates when focussing * Opticaly good * good to very good sharpness * strong chomatic aberations * contrast suffers at long end

product.name: Tokina 16-50mm f/2.8 AT-X Pro DX (Nikon)
product.description: High quality normal zoom. Fast focus speed, because external motor is used. Very good build quality. A very similar lens is sold by Pentax (DA* 16-50mm f/2.8), but the Tokina version is not weather protected.
